direct_enhancements.reason: Both methods query the maximum amount of an asset that can be transferred or borrowed, respectively.
Both methods access and retrieve data related to the margin account, providing insights into account limits and status.
Both methods involve operations related to asset transfers and account state changes.

enhanced_by.reason: Initializing the margin account is a prerequisite for querying transferable amounts.
Setting up the environment ensures that the margin account is in a valid state for querying transferable amounts.
Verifying the transferable amount ensures that the returned value is within expected limits and handles any discrepancies.
